# The `MipsNaClELFStreamer` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Extend the generic MCELFStreamer class so that it can mask dangerous instructions. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Extend the generic MCELFStreamer class so that it can mask dangerous instructions.

Definition at line 42 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipsnaclelfstreamer-cpp">MipsNaClELFStreamer.cpp</a>.

### emitInstruction() {#aa58798011dd108a27dfd0734caa2c4eb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;MipsNaClELFStreamer.cpp&#125;::MipsNaClELFStreamer::emitInstruction (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp; Inst, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp; STI)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
This function is the one used to emit instruction data into the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf">ELF</a> streamer.

We override it to mask dangerous instructions.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipsnaclelfstreamer-cpp/#l00145">145</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/lib/target/mips/mctargetdesc/mipsnaclelfstreamer-cpp">MipsNaClELFStreamer.cpp</a>.
